XVColVector Class Reference

XVColVector class For specifics on the member functions here, see the XVMatrix class from which this is derived. Basically, XVRowVector is a horizontal matrix, while XVColVector is a vertical matrix. More...

Detailed Description

XVColVector class For specifics on the member functions here, see the XVMatrix class from which this is derived. Basically, XVRowVector is a horizontal matrix, while XVColVector is a vertical matrix.
